timeline.bodyText: do we also need to pass the state function here? Wouldnt that make on component dependend on the other?
timeline.author: cristianonicolai

replies.bodyText: @cristianonicolai  i would say yes, right now it is dependent. i am passing this function here because i have set enableCache as false when "apply columns" button is clicked, so that the query fetched data from network.
replies.author: Sara4994

replies.bodyText: sure, but does the parent component needs to be notified/changed because of that? I was wondering if this would be the internal state of the child component.
replies.author: cristianonicolai

replies.bodyText:
@cristianonicolai yep, the function is used to set enableCache as true here in parent component, 
  
    
      kogito-apps/packages/management-console/src/components/Templates/DomainExplorerDashboard/DomainExplorerDashboard.tsx
    
    
         Line 136
      in
      1acc922
    
    
    
    

        
          
           setEnableCache(true); 
        
    
  


it would be set as true when moving process details -> Domain list so that the query will run with cache, but then when we click on "apply columns" it should trigger query freshly without cache so i am setting at as false in the child component using same function "setEnableCache"
